title: looking for serious ranked team.
body: I'm a plat 4 top lane mian that is looking to join a ranked team that will play regularly and that play to win. i have been in multiple teams where they are just mucking around for their rewards or are only on once every 3-4 days. im looking for something more serious than that. ign is LP boxie or comment on here if interested. thanks.

replies.body: Hey man, i am looking for a serious ranked team too so if you wanna create one together or something like that?
